info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of customer external account aggregation.
info.title: Party Customer Open Banking Connections APIs

post.summary: Initiate a request to map a new external account into customer profile

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Revoke the access of existing external accounts for a customer

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Renew the access of existing external accounts for a customer

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Refresh the existing external accounts to get the up to date details

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of details on third parties, banks and customers
get.description: Retrieves third party provider consents details

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

otherBankConsentType.description: Refers to the Other Banks Consent Types.

consents.description: Refers the consents given by the customer

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentStartAt.description: Refers to the time at which the consent starts

consentExpiryAt.description: Refers to the time at which the consent expires

bankId.description: Refers to the ID of the bank with which the transaction is performed.

bankName.description: The name of the bank being referred to.

bankCode.description: Refers to the Code of the bank with which the transaction is performed.

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

obcpId.description: Refers to the ID of the Other Banks Consent Period.

obcpConnectionId.description: Refers to the  ConnectionID of the Other Banks Consent Period.

connectionStatus.description: Updates the Connection Status of the Transaction.

subStatus.description: Updates the Sub Status of the Transaction.

currentState.description: Refers to the Current State of the Transaction.

latestToken.description: Refers to the Latest Token of the ongoing Transaction.

latestRedirectUrl.description: Refers to the Latest Redirected URL of the ongoing Transaction.

defaultConsentArrangementId.description: Refers to the ID of the Default Consent Arrangement.

obcpToken.description: Refers to the Token of the Other Banks Consent Period.

obcpRedirectUrl.description: Refers to the  Redirected URL of the Other Banks Consent Period.

otherBankConsentPeriodDays.description: Refers to the number of days in the Other Banks Consent Period.

otherBankConsentGivenAt.description: Refers to when the Other Banks Consent Period Starts.

otherBankConsentExpiresAt.description: Refers to when the Other Banks Consent Period Expires.

consentGivenAt.description: Refers to when the Consent was given at.

termsAccepted.description: Defines whether the user has accepted the Terms and Conditions first displayed when the user logs in to the system for the very first time.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.
